title: Bug 134949 - Themes Nesting Issue in Library
description: Themes are nesting in another library (Bug 134949). When using Library A and attempting to use Library B's themes, an error occurs.
OB: When I open Library A in the library explorer and attempt to drag and drop themes from Library B into the layout, an error message pops up. The error message mentions that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: I expected to be able to use themes from Library B within Library A without encountering any errors. The themes from Library B should seamlessly integrate into the layout of Library A.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the library explorer.
2. Select Library A.
3. Attempt to drag and drop themes from Library B into the layout of Library A.
